content: Hi all! Connectathon Track Reports need to be recorded in Confluence by 3:00 PM please! You can find the quick link from the main Connectathon 26 page. https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021+-+01+HL7+FHIR+Connectathon+Track+Report+Outs

Hey FHIR Connectathon 27 Track Leads! Please record your report out by end of day tomorrow. There is a quick link on the main Confluence site that goes to the document here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1nvsv7vEK7pfIZr5iARTLGmvp7rvn9yxR/edit
@Sandra Vance we can't access Google doc from within our network, it is blocked by policy. Would you be able to email me a copy of the doc and I can email back with our portion?

Neelima Karipineni said:

Sandra Vance we can't access Google doc from within our network, it is blocked by policy. Would you be able to email me a copy of the doc and I can email back with our portion?

done
